Package com.cmas.controller

Class UserManager

java.lang.Object
com.cmas.controller.UserManager
public class UserManager extends Object
Controller class that manages user-related operations such as registration, password updates, and user validation. This class interacts with the underlying database model objects to store and retrieve user information based on view inputs.
Since:
2023-11-14

  • Method Details

    • registerStudentAsCommMember

      public static void registerStudentAsCommMember(Student student, UUID campID)
      Registers a student as a Camp Committee Member and adds them to the user database.
      Parameters:
      student - The student to be registered as a Camp Committee Member.
      campID - The UUID of the camp to which the student is associated as a committee member.

    • showUsers

      public static void showUsers()
      Displays information about all users (students and staff) in the user database.

    • updatePassword

      public static void updatePassword(User user, String password)
      Updates the password of a given user.
      Parameters:
      user - The user whose password needs to be updated.
      password - The new password.

    • containsUser

      public static boolean containsUser(String userID)
      Checks if a user with the given userID exists in the user database.
      Parameters:
      userID - The userID to check.
      Returns:
      True if the user exists; false otherwise.

    • getUser

      public static User getUser(String userID)
      Retrieves a user with the given userID from the user database.
      Parameters:
      userID - The userID of the user to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The User object associated with the given userID.

    • addUser

      public static void addUser(String userID, User user)
      Adds a new user to the user database.
      Parameters:
      userID - The userID of the new user.
      user - The User object to add to the database.

    • removeUser

      public static void removeUser(String userID)

      Parameters:
      userID - The userID of the user to remove.

    • validateUser

      public static boolean validateUser(String userID, String password)
      Validates the login credentials of a user.
      Parameters:
      userID - The userID of the user.
      password - The password to validate.
      Returns:
      true if the credentials are valid; false otherwise.
